choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today presuming no dietary restrictions.
Sure, here's a healthy meal plan for you today:
Breakfast:
- Greek yogurt with berries and granola
- Scrambled eggs with spinach and tomatoes
- Oatmeal with sliced almonds and raisins

Lunch:
- Salad with mixed greens, grilled chicken breast, avocado, cherry tomatoes, and balsamic vinaigrette
- Lentil soup with whole wheat bread
- Tuna salad sandwich on whole grain bread with lettuce and tomato

Snacks:
- Carrot sticks with hummus
- Apple slices with almond butter
- Rice cakes with cheese and tomato

Dinner:
- Baked fish (such as salmon or tilapia) with roasted vegetables (such as broccoli, carrots, and sweet potatoes)
- Stir-fry with lean beef or chicken, bell peppers, onions, and brown rice
- Pasta with marinara sauce and grilled chicken breast

Drinks:
- Water throughout the day
- Herbal tea in between meals
